question: Viresh Kundu has won bronze in which Greco-Roman wrestling category at the 2018 Asian Junior Championships in New Delhi?
explanation: Viresh Kundu has won bronze in the 97kg Greco-Roman  wrestling category at the 2018 Asian Junior Championships in New Delhi on July 18, 2018. Viresh, who hails from Uttar Pradesh and trains in Zirakpur, defeated South Korea\'s Jeongyul Kwon by 14-5 in the 97 kg Bronze medal play-off to win his first international medal.
